def transform_dataset(input_list):
    # Combine sublists into a single list
    combined_list = [item for sublist in input_list for item in sublist]
    # Return the combined list wrapped in another list
    return [combined_list]

# Example usage
input_list = [['Alter, Aaron J.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions']]
output_list = transform_dataset(input_list)
print(output_list)

def transform_dataset(input_list):
    # Combine sublists into a single list
    combined_list = [item for sublist in input_list for item in sublist]
    # Return the combined list wrapped in another list
    return [combined_list]

# Example usage
input_list = [['Anthony, Scott A.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Avina, Jon C.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Baudler, Mark B.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Beard, Brian K.'], ['Partner'], ['Austin'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Berger, David J.'], ['Partner'], ['San Francisco, Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions']]

def transform_dataset(input_list):
    # Combine sublists into a single list
    combined_list = [item for sublist in input_list for item in sublist]
    # Return the combined list wrapped in another list
    return [combined_list]

# Example usage
input_list = [['Alter, Aaron J.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions']]
output_list = transform_dataset(input_list)
print(output_list)
```

def transform_dataset(input_list):
    # Combine sublists into a single list
    combined_list = [item for sublist in input_list for item in sublist]
    # Return the combined list wrapped in another list
    return [combined_list]

# Example usage
input_list = [['Anthony, Scott A.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Avina, Jon C.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Baudler, Mark B.'], ['Partner'], ['Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Beard, Brian K.'], ['Partner'], ['Austin'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions'], ['Berger, David J.'], ['Partner'], ['San Francisco, Palo Alto'], ['Mergers & Acquisitions']]
output_list = transform_dataset(input_list)
print(output_list)
